keyMappings:
# Dvorak 
unmap x
map ; removeTab
unmap X
map : restoreTab

map q goBack
map x goForward

unmap d
unmap u
unmap b
map b scrollPageDown
map w scrollPageUp

map h previousTab
map l nextTab

map L scrollRight
map H scrollLeft

map i focusInput

unmap g0
unmap g$
map 0 firstTab
map $ lastTab

map [ goPrevious
map ] goNext
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
g: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s Google
gi: 	https://www.google.com/search?tbm=isch&q=%s Google Image Search
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
d: https://duckduckgo.com/?q=%s DuckDuckGo
a: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s/?field-keywords=%s Amazon

# Find your way from your home to places using Google Maps
home: https://www.google.com/maps/dir/home/%s
